name: GuilloTeam_SurviveTheCrash
description:
A game made during the Epic Mega jam 2020.

"June 12, 1942 - It's been three days now since my plane crashed. I've been here for days waiting for help that won't come. My resources are starting to dwindle. Tomorrow I will definitely leave the crash site to start looking for help. I've been stuck in this hell for so long ... But I'm not done yet"
